traits.name: Furtive
entries: The spythronar swarm can use a bonus action to take the Hide action.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spythronar swarm can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Swarm
entries: The spythronar swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny arachnid. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

traits.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the spythronar swarm knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker
entries: The spythronar swarm ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Bites
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. 10 (4d4 damage) piercing damage and 9 (2d8 damage) lightning damage, or 5 (2d4 damage) piercing damage and 4 (1d8 damage) lightning damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

actions.name: Weave (4/Day)
entries: The spythronar swarm weaves webbing, covering a 5-foot square. The swarm can then give up 1 hit point to create a spythronar sac in that space. If the swarm's webbing covers a 10-foot square, it can give up 23 hit points as part of the same action, creating a spythronar web with the same number of hit points. The swarm can't drop to 0 hit points to create a sac or web.

If the swarm weaves an incomplete web, that web is a normal web rather than a sentient, monstrous one. A creature that enters this normal web's space must succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw or become {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10}) and {@condition restrained} while {@condition grappled} in this way. Each 5-foot square of this web has AC 10; the damage vulnerabilities, immunities, and resistances of a spythronar web; and 5 hit points.
